price: ដូចេ្នះ ពិតប្រាកដណាស់ពួកគេគឺត្រូវបរិភោគអំពីដើមឈើ នោះ ហើយពោះរបស់ពួកគេពេញទៅដោយវា។
arabic: فَإِنَّهُمۡ لَأٓكِلُونَ مِنۡهَا فَمَالِـُٔونَ مِنۡهَا ٱلۡبُطُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: fa-innahum laākilūna min'hā famāliūna min'hā al-buṭūna
